desc: FOSAD has been one of the foremost educational events established with the goal of disseminating knowledge in the critical area of security in computer systems and networks. Over the years, both the summer school and the book series have represented a reference point for graduate students and young researchers from academia or industry, interested to approach the field, investigate open problems, and follow priority lines of research.

details.authors: Alessandro Aldini, Javier Lopez, Fabio Martinelli

title: Foundations of Security Analysis and Design VII: FOSAD 2012 / 2013 Tutorial Lectures (Lecture Notes in Computer Science)
